ygData.subject: Re: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I posted it to the Song Analysis website.  I used a level 1 wizard as my test subject. Pulse = mana restore, no residual effect. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana
ygData.messageBody:
>From: jhenders@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)
>Date: Mon, 29 Nov 1999 13:57:35 -0800
>
>On Mon, Nov 29/99, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
> >
> > Since mana song is instant effect, and not pulse based, twisting
> > it just hurts the effectiveness.
>
>When did this come to light? I've never seen anyone post any tests that
>showed the mana song didn't last the same 3 tics as any other song.
>

I posted it to the Song Analysis website. I used a level 1 wizard as my
test subject. Pulse = mana restore, no residual effect.



Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
